page.title: 17ESTATE HOUSES IN HORSHAM
page.content: Hills Farm{Housing Estate}is a large,modern, private estate, situated between Broadbridge Heath and Horsham, about a mile from each.It consists of {463 flats}and{detached,semi- {detached and terraced houses.}They range from one-bedroomed to four- bedroomed,and have either garages (for the bigger houses) or parking spaces in the separate car parks provided.All the houses have gardens, at least seven metres by seven,and both the houses and flats have lofts. Downstairs there is a kitchen, a living/dining room,and a storage room under the stairs.Upstairs there is a bathroom,an airing cupboard and all the bedrooms.Most of the houses are very small. The houses were built by Croudace, and were completed in a series of phases between{1980 and 1984.
